name: upload-bom-dtrack-task
description: Upload a BOM file to Dependency Track platform.
author: Edouard Shaar

inputs.name: bomFilePath
inputs.label: BOM File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path where the BOM file is located. (e.g. 'directory/**/bom.xml').

inputs.name: dtrackProjId
inputs.label: Project Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: The guid of the project in Dependency Track

inputs.name: dtrackURI
inputs.label: Dependency Track URI
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL to the Dependency Track platform

inputs.name: thresholdAction
inputs.label: Action on Threshold
inputs.helpMarkDown: The result of the task if the threshold is attained.

inputs.name: thresholdCritical
inputs.label: Critical Vulnerability Count
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Maximum number of critical vulnerabilities to tolerate.
A value of -1 disables this threshold.

inputs.name: thresholdHigh
inputs.label: High Vulnerability Count
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Maximum number of high vulnerabilities to tolerate.
A value of -1 disables this threshold.

inputs.name: thresholdMedium
inputs.label: Medium Vulnerability Count
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Maximum number of medium vulnerabilities to tolerate.
A value of -1 disables this threshold.

inputs.name: thresholdLow
inputs.label: Low Vulnerability Count
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Maximum number of low vulnerabilities to tolerate.
A value of -1 disables this threshold.

inputs.name: thresholdUnassigned
inputs.label: Unassigned Vulnerability Count
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Maximum number of unassigned vulnerabilities to tolerate.
A value of -1 disables this threshold.

messages.FileNotFound: BOM file path is not a file: %s
messages.BOMUploadStarting: Starting BOM upload to Dependency Track at url: %s
messages.BOMUploadFailed: Uploading the BOM to Dependency Track Failed: %s
messages.ThresholdInNotAnInteger: %s threshold needs to be an integer value.
messages.ProcessingBOM: Waitting for Dependency Track to finish processing the BOM.
